goal.en: # The actual teaching objectives and content of this course will be finalized within three weeks after the start of the semester. The main purpose of this course is to introduce the methods and applications of comparative language analysis. Students who have completed the course and passed the semester grade assessment should be able to: 1. Understand the theoretical basis of contrastive analysis (CA); 2. Explore the typological characteristics of Chinese and English through CA; 3. Applying CA to second language teaching.
goal.ch: #本課程之實際教學目標和內容將於開學後三周內定案。 本課程主要目的在於介紹語言對比分析的方法和應用。修習完畢並通過學期成績評量的學生應能： 1. 認識對比分析的理論基礎； 2. 透過對比分析探索中、英語的語法特性； 3. 將對比分析應用於第二語言教學。

content.en:
1 Theoretical basis of Contrastive analysis
2 Theoretical basis of error analysis and interlanguage
3 Language transfer and cross-language influence
4 Methods and contents of Contrastive analysis
5 Contrastive analysis of Mandarin Chinese and English
6 Contrastive analysis, error analysis and teaching application
content.ch:
單元 講題
1 對比分析的理論基礎
2 偏誤分析的理論基礎和中介語
3 語言遷移和跨語言影響
4 對比分析的方法和內容
5 中、英語言類型的特性
6 對比分析、偏誤分析與教學應用

textbook.en: The main class book: Chen, F. J. (2012) Contrastive Analysis and It‘s Application in Language Pedagogy. Taipei: Crane.
textbook.ch: 主要上課用書： 陳俊光. (2012) 《對比分析與教學應用》。台北：文鶴。
